segments.text: I ’ m so excited , mother . Oh , a new baby !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And my first nephew . He looks a lot like you , mum . He does .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think so ? Well , I guess . He does look a lot like me . Oh , he ’ s got Richard ’ s eyes though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , he does have Richard ’ s eyes . The baby even looks like you than Richard does .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , children usually resemble their parents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s true . Michelle is a lot like Henry in so many ways . And she is shy with new people just like he is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You often like comparing children with their parents .
segments.speaker: S2
